description: view from inside ruins of forum, with broken-off columns; tall column with sculpture of standing figure at center; Classical buildings in middle ground beyond ruins
medium: Pen and black ink with gray wash
provenance: [G. T. Seiden, Chiltern Street Gallery, London; sold to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (before 1982-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC below image, in brown: [Antonio Aquaroni dilinet 1827]
title: Forum of Trajan, Rome
